meta.title: Discord Webhook Manager - Supercharge Your Discord Communication
meta.description: Effortlessly manage, automate, and send rich messages to your Discord channels. Streamline announcements, updates, and interactions with our intuitive Webhook Manager.

hero.heading: Supercharge Your Discord Communication
hero.subtext: Eliminate manual work, costly bots, and complex custom solutions. Effortlessly manage, automate, and send rich messages to your Discord channels, streamlining announcements and interactions with our intuitive Webhook Manager.

centralized.title: Centralized Webhook Management
centralized.desc: Keep all your Discord webhooks organized in one place. Easily add, edit, and delete webhooks, eliminating the hassle of juggling multiple Discord servers or manual configurations.

richMessages.title: Rich Message Composition
richMessages.desc: Craft stunning Discord messages with full support for embeds, custom avatars, and usernames. Make your announcements stand out without the need for custom bots or tedious manual work.

customAvatars.title: Custom Avatars & Identities
customAvatars.desc: Define and reuse custom avatars and usernames for your webhook messages, allowing for dynamic and engaging announcements tailored to different requirements.

ui.title: Intuitive User Interface
ui.desc: Our clean and user-friendly dashboard makes managing your Discord webhooks a breeze, even for beginners.

secure.title: Secure & Reliable
secure.desc: Built with security in mind, ensuring your webhook data and Discord interactions are safe and dependable.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.desc: Have questions, feedback, or just want to say hello? Feel free to reach out!

footer.copyright: Discord Webhook Manager. All rights reserved.

header.title: Welcome Back
header.subtitle: Sign in to your account using email, Google, or Discord.

form.errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
form.errorShortPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
form.errorSignInFailed: Sign-in failed. Please check your credentials and try again.

dashboard.manage: Manage your Discord webhooks and messages
dashboard.gettingStartedDesc: New to webhook management? Here's how to get started quickly.

steps.oneDesc: Add a Discord webhook URL to start sending messages.
steps.twoDesc: Test your webhook by sending a message to your Discord channel.
steps.threeDesc: Build reusable templates and schedule messages for later.

dashboard.title: Webhooks
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your Discord webhooks

noResults.desc: Try adjusting your search query or filters

templates.title: Message Templates
templates.subtitle: Create and manage reusable message templates
templates.noTemplatesSubtitle: Create your first message template to get started
templates.deleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the template "{name}" from your account.

createTemplate.subtitle: Design your Discord message with live preview

settingsPage.title: Account Settings
settingsPage.subtitle: Manage your profile, authentication, and usage limits.

accountType.title: Account Type
accountType.desc: Check your current plan and features.

accountQuotes.free: The perfect starting point for managing your webhooks.
accountQuotes.paid: More power and higher limits for growing needs.
accountQuotes.premium: Maximum power for the most demanding users and projects.

usage.title: Usage
usage.desc: Track your current usage and limits

plans.title: Manage Plans
plans.desc: Upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your current subscription.

support.title: Support
support.desc: Share your love for the app or get in touch for support.
support.message: We love hearing feedback! If you find the app helpful, consider sharing your positive experience on Twitter.
support.dm: For support or bug reports, please DM @ctrix on Twitter.

clearData.title: Clear Local Data
clearData.desc: This will clear all local storage data, including your preferences and cached data. This is useful for troubleshooting. You will be logged out.

password.title: Password
password.descCreate: Create a password to enable email login

discord.title: Discord Account
discord.descLink: Link your Discord account for OAuth login

sendMessagePage.subtitle: Send messages immediately to one or multiple webhooks

sendMessagePage.threadHint: If specified, the message will be sent to a new thread
sendMessagePage.urlHint: If provided, the message will replace the existing Discord message at this URL.

sendMessagePage.success: Message sent successfully to {count, plural, one {# webhook} other {# webhooks}}

sendMessagePage.errorContent: Please enter a message or add an embed

plansPage.subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your needs.
